```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)

```


```{r Load}

tt <- tt_load("2021-01-12")

tt %>% 
  map(glimpse)

artwork <- tt$artwork
artists <- tt$artists

```


```{r datapre}

artists %>% 
  drop_na(yearOfBirth, yearOfDeath, gender) %>% 
  group_by(gender) %>% 
  mutate(age = yearOfDeath - yearOfBirth) %>% 
  summarise(age_mean = mean(age))

```
